physical_examinations.relevant_findings: A young Caucasian woman with symmetrically distributed, hide-bound, depressed plaques on hips and buttocks. Two large plaques measuring 15 x 38 cm, smooth, firm, and well-demarcated. Skin biopsy showed thickened collagen bundles and elastic fibers consistent with connective tissue nevus.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Plaques have been present since 3 years of age and have grown proportionately in size with the patient.
